img_above_text:
![Fine Gold Thread .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Fine_Gold_Thread_.jpg)| Fine Gold Thread| Legendary | General armor upgrade material | • Defeat Cyan Loong on the right of Bitter-Lake - Turtle Island in The New West ( Loong Scales required)
• Purchased from Shrine Stores in The Webbed Hollow• Dropped from Yaoguai Chiefs and Yaoguai Kings in The Webbed Hollow

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the "Fine Gold Thread," a legendary armor upgrade material in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It can be obtained by defeating Cyan Loong near Bitter-Lake - Turtle Island, purchased from Shrine Stores in The Webbed Hollow, or dropped by Yaoguai Chiefs and Kings in the same region. The item is part of a crafting and upgrade system, as indicated by its inclusion alongside other materials like Jade Fang and Flame Ebongold.
